member.name: M:FiniteElementsProject.FEProject.ChangeInputFile(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the default name of .txt input file

member.name: M:FiniteElementsProject.IFEProject.ChangeInputFile(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the default name of .txt input file

member.name: T:FiniteElementsProject.InputData
member.summary: Creates an object which holds all the necessary data and properties of the model. Specifically it stores: 1. nodal coordinates, 2. connectivity info, 3. for each element its type, section area, young modulus, moment of inertia, 4. bounded nodes, 5. external forces

member.name: M:FiniteElementsProject.InputData.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for InputData class. The default .txt name is WriteLines2.txt

member.name: M:FiniteElementsProject.InputData.SetNewInputFile(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the name of the default input .txt file
